page.title: 05Meeting Places - Bromp on Sw
page.content: { {7.C.of.E.PRIMARY SCHOOL.}The new school replaced the old church hall and temporary classrooms in 1982. Most village children 4_11 years attend. Staff of 3 teachers 1 part time. School-parent related activities such as Sports Day, Concerts, Fund-raising events as well as Womens Institute meetings and Brownies take place there. {8.OPEN SPACES. }Childrens play area.Cricket field._boys have football matches here+elsewhere .Fun run in summer. Riverside_angling club_catch trout,dace,chub+perch.Village bonfire and camp fires.Open spaces in centre of housing estates_Carol singing.
